title: Software Engineer (Full Stack)
description: We are seeking a Full Stack Software Engineer with experience in building scalable web applications. The ideal candidate should have proficiency in React, Node.js, PostgreSQL, and AWS. Responsibilities include developing user interfaces, server-side logic, and cloud deployment. Strong problem-solving skills and experience with RESTful APIs are essential.

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description: Looking for a Machine Learning Engineer skilled in Python, TensorFlow, and Scikit-learn. The role involves building, training, and deploying ML models, working on data pipelines, and collaborating with data scientists to enhance product intelligence.

title: DevOps Engineer
description: We need a DevOps Engineer with expertise in Docker, Kubernetes, and CI/CD pipelines. Experience in managing AWS or Azure infrastructure is required. The role includes automating deployments, monitoring systems, and ensuring high availability.

title: Data Scientist
description: Seeking a Data Scientist proficient in Python, SQL, and PowerBI. Responsibilities include analyzing large datasets, building predictive models, and delivering actionable insights to stakeholders.

title: Frontend Developer
description: We’re hiring a Frontend Developer with strong skills in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and frameworks like Vue.js or Angular. The candidate will work closely with designers to implement responsive and interactive UIs.

title: Backend Developer
description: Hiring a Backend Developer experienced in Java/Spring Boot or Node.js. The role involves designing REST APIs, managing databases, and ensuring server-side performance and scalability.

title: Embedded Systems Engineer
description: Looking for an Embedded Systems Engineer with expertise in C/C++ and real-time operating systems. The role includes developing firmware for microcontrollers and debugging hardware interfaces.

title: Blockchain Developer
description: Seeking a Blockchain Developer with hands-on experience in Solidity, Ethereum, and smart contract development. Responsibilities include designing decentralized applications and ensuring security in blockchain protocols.

title: Cybersecurity Analyst
description: We need a Cybersecurity Analyst with experience in threat detection, SIEM tools, firewalls, and ISO 27001 compliance. The role involves monitoring for vulnerabilities and implementing security measures.

title: Game Developer
description: Hiring a Game Developer proficient in Unity or Unreal Engine, C#, and 3D/2D game development. Candidates should be able to collaborate with artists and designers to create engaging gameplay experiences.

title: NLP Engineer
description: Looking for an NLP Engineer skilled in BERT/GPT, Transformers, and text classification. The role includes developing NLP pipelines, working with large language models, and fine-tuning for specific use cases.

title: Computer Vision Engineer
description: We are hiring a Computer Vision Engineer with experience in OpenCV, YOLO, and TensorFlow. The role involves developing image processing algorithms and integrating vision systems into applications.

title: AI Research Scientist
description: Seeking an AI Research Scientist to explore deep learning and LLM innovations. Responsibilities include publishing research papers, developing prototypes, and collaborating with academia.

title: Speech Recognition Specialist
description: Looking for a Speech Recognition Specialist with expertise in Kaldi, DeepSpeech, and audio preprocessing. The role includes improving ASR accuracy and deploying speech-based applications.

title: Reinforcement Learning Expert
description: We need a Reinforcement Learning Expert skilled in policy gradients, Gym environments, and PyTorch. The role focuses on developing intelligent agents and optimizing decision-making systems.

title: Data Analyst
description: Hiring a Data Analyst with strong SQL skills and experience with tools like Tableau and Excel. Responsibilities include data cleaning, visualization, and generating business reports.

title: BI Developer
description: We are looking for a BI Developer to design ETL pipelines, build dashboards, and manage data warehouses. Proficiency in Power BI or Looker is required.

title: Data Engineer
description: Seeking a Data Engineer experienced in Spark, Hadoop, and Airflow. The role involves building scalable data pipelines and managing data lakes.

title: Quantitative Analyst
description: Looking for a Quant Analyst with a strong background in statistics, finance models, and programming in R/Python. Responsibilities include risk modeling and quantitative research.

title: CRM Data Specialist
description: Hiring a CRM Data Specialist with experience in Salesforce, customer segmentation, and marketing analytics. The role involves maintaining data integrity and reporting on customer metrics.

title: Project Manager
description: We are seeking a Project Manager with experience in Agile and Scrum. Responsibilities include managing project timelines, stakeholder communication, and resource allocation.

title: Product Manager
description: Looking for a Product Manager to define roadmaps, gather user feedback, and prioritize features. Experience in market research and product lifecycle management is essential.

title: Business Analyst
description: Hiring a Business Analyst skilled in requirements gathering, data analysis, and creating UML diagrams. The role supports decision-making and aligns technical teams with business goals.

title: Operations Manager
description: We need an Operations Manager to oversee logistics, supply chain management, and operational efficiency. Strong leadership and coordination skills are required.

title: HR Manager
description: Seeking an HR Manager experienced in recruitment, onboarding, HRIS systems, and compliance. The role includes employee engagement and policy management.

title: Chartered Accountant (CA)
description: Hiring a CA with knowledge in auditing, taxation, and statutory compliance. Responsibilities include financial reporting and liaising with regulatory authorities.

title: Financial Analyst
description: Looking for a Financial Analyst to perform budgeting, forecasting, and financial modeling. Strong Excel and analytical skills are required.

title: Investment Banker
description: Seeking an Investment Banker experienced in M&A, pitch book creation, and valuation modeling. The role involves working with corporate clients on financial deals.

title: Corporate Lawyer
description: Hiring a Corporate Lawyer with experience in contract law, M&A, and legal advisory. Responsibilities include drafting documents and ensuring legal compliance.

title: Compliance Officer
description: Looking for a Compliance Officer with expertise in KYC/AML regulations and internal audits. The role involves enforcing company policies and regulatory frameworks.

title: UI/UX Designer
description: Seeking a UI/UX Designer skilled in Figma, user research, wireframing, and prototyping. The role focuses on improving product usability and visual design.

title: Graphic Designer
description: Hiring a Graphic Designer with experience in Adobe Suite, branding, and digital content creation. Responsibilities include creating visuals for marketing campaigns.

title: Motion Graphics Artist
description: Looking for a Motion Graphics Artist proficient in After Effects and animation tools. The role involves creating engaging motion graphics for videos and ads.

title: Interior Designer
description: We need an Interior Designer skilled in AutoCAD, space planning, and client presentations. The role includes designing functional and aesthetic interior spaces.

title: Game Designer
description: Hiring a Game Designer to develop game mechanics, levels, and storylines. Experience in prototyping and balancing gameplay is preferred.

title: Digital Marketing Specialist
description: Seeking a Digital Marketing Specialist with skills in SEO, SEM, Google Ads, and content strategy. The role includes campaign planning and performance tracking.

title: Content Writer
description: Looking for a Content Writer to produce blog posts, whitepapers, and SEO-friendly content. Strong writing and research skills are essential.

title: Social Media Manager
description: We are hiring a Social Media Manager to handle content calendars, engagement strategies, and analytics for various platforms.

title: Sales Executive (B2B)
description: Seeking a B2B Sales Executive experienced in lead generation, cold calling, and CRM management. The role involves achieving sales targets and client acquisition.

title: Brand Manager
description: Looking for a Brand Manager to lead brand strategy, execute marketing campaigns, and conduct competitor analysis.

title: Clinical Research Associate
description: Hiring a Clinical Research Associate to monitor trials, ensure regulatory compliance, and manage site documentation.

title: Pharmacovigilance Specialist
description: We need a Pharmacovigilance Specialist with expertise in drug safety reporting and adverse event monitoring.

title: Medical Coder
description: Looking for a Medical Coder proficient in ICD-10 and CPT coding. The role includes reviewing patient records and assigning medical codes.

title: Biomedical Engineer
description: Seeking a Biomedical Engineer to develop and test medical devices. Skills in CAD software and regulatory standards are required.

title: Healthcare Data Analyst
description: Hiring a Healthcare Data Analyst to analyze EHR data, track KPIs, and generate healthcare insights.

title: Civil Engineer
description: We are looking for a Civil Engineer skilled in structural design, AutoCAD, and on-site supervision. The role involves planning and executing construction projects.

title: Mechanical Design Engineer
description: Seeking a Mechanical Engineer with SolidWorks experience for designing mechanical systems and components.

title: Electrical Engineer
description: Hiring an Electrical Engineer with experience in PLC, SCADA, and circuit design. Responsibilities include electrical system planning and troubleshooting.

title: Construction Project Manager
description: Looking for a Construction Project Manager to manage construction timelines, budget, and vendor coordination.

title: HVAC Engineer
description: Seeking an HVAC Engineer to design and implement heating, ventilation, and air conditioning systems. Proficiency in duct design and load calculations is required.
